entries.journal_entry_description: On the planet of Mustafar you have been approached by some sort of spirit. This being has tasked you with destroying a powerful force crystal before it falls in to the hands of evil.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: You have done as the spirit asked and forged the bond between you and the crystal. Try to find the spirit and find out what to do next, before the spirit within the shard destroys your sanity.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: The spirit has explained where the chamber entrance is 'North of the center volcano is what's called the Burning Plains. In the north east corner of the plains you will find the entrance to the chamber'. You have to make it there quickly before who ever it is that's chasing you, catches up.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Talk to the spirit and find out how to get inside the hidden chamber.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: The spirit has asked you to destroy the tainted crystal in the hidden chamber.
